name: VoxWorld [WIP]
description:
Welcome! I am Mirko Bug, the developer of VoxWorld!

VoxWorld is a survival game based on voxels.
The 5 core features of VoxWorld are:

1- Plenty of different biomes
2- Plenty of various enemies
3- Epic and mysterious caves
4- Vast variety of Ores
5- Sandbox


JOIN THE DISCORD SERVER! Click Me!

This game is made using Unity and its being developed constantly!
Join discord server HERE to know more and get realtime updates!
